description:
The BP for the multi cluster did not treat the following correctly:
- snapshot
- reboot
- destroy
- pause
- unpause
- suspend
- resume
- rescue
- unrescue
- power off
- power on
-poll reboot
- get info
- get diagnostics
- vif plug.unplug
phew
title: VMware: some API's return only data on the first cluster and not the correct cluster

comments.content:
The BP for the multi cluster did not treat the following correctly:
- snapshot
- reboot
- destroy
- pause
- unpause
- suspend
- resume
- rescue
- unrescue
- power off
- power on
-poll reboot
- get info
- get diagnostics
- vif plug.unplug
phew
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/46789

commit 1a5c23a2810d4c887d1239eeab09dd9904892c8e
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Sep 16 12:02:13 2013 -0700

    VMware: fix bug for incorrect cluster access
    
    For a number of methods only the first cluster would be accessed
    and not the correct cluster.
    
    Fixes bug: 1226211
    
    Change-Id: I4eb3c360fc81de172e46418d5a16dd2bd7077fea
